descendants.content: @robsonfletcher seeing the latest photos this evening has brought me on the edge of tears. So many happy memories of visits to Jasper, with my friends, with my family, and with the love of my life. All these years later, it’s still the only place in the world I’d rather be. 🖤

descendants.content:
@robsonfletcher We all thought we were living in our ideal home, Planet Earth, but then, disaster. It’s disappointing but woke that a two year old child feels the same loss as an adult, such a short time to transform the trees to matchsticks.
#wildfire #Jasper #Alberta #climateurgency

account.note:
Degree in Political Science, career in tech.

Gamer of all types from boardgames to computer games to console games. See ‪@Igaze‬ for gaming posts.
